extendedInfo.description: Watch Puss in Boots come to life right in your screen! Pose and snap some pictures with the legendary Puss in Boots, the mastermind Humpty Dumpty, the street-savvy Kitty Softpaws, and the outlaws Jack and Jill. You can even apply a filter effect and share with your friends! Features: â       Choose from an array of characters from the Puss in Boots movie â       Move and resize the characters with the flick of a finger to find the perfect pose â       Select from 4 different effect filters to perfect your photo â       Save your photo to your phone, or share it with your friends â       Check out the latest teasers and trailers from the Puss in Boots movie
